title: Augmented Reality-Based Science Inquiry and Reflective Thinking Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and proficiency in mobile device utilization
context.additional_context: Strengthening self-directed learning and collaboration using mobile apps in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can perform observation-prediction-explanation stages in the scientific inquiry process with 80% accuracy based on AR simulations and question prompts.
Learners can structure their thinking processes into three stages (description-analysis-evaluation) by writing reflective journals after inquiry activities.
Learners can propose at least two improvement strategies for inquiry methods through peer feedback sessions.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
